name: terminal
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: terminal
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (of a disease or illness) leading gradually to death
A terminal patient is one who is seriously ill and will die soon.

dsense.name: terminal
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: extreme, when referring to something unpleasant or negative

example.eg: She claims that the shipbuilding industry is in terminal decline.
example.egtrans: 她声称造船业已经衰败到了极点。

example.eg: He has nothing to do all day and is suffering from terminal boredom.
example.egtrans: 他终日无所事事，极其无聊。

name: terminal
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: terminal
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the area or building at a station, airport, or port that is used by passengers leaving or arriving by train, aircraft, or ship

example.eg: Terminal 3 is used mostly for domestic flights.
example.egtrans: 三号航站楼主要用于国内航班。

dsense.name: terminal
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a piece of equipment consisting of a keyboard and screen, used for communicating with the part of a computer system that deals with information

dsense.name: terminal
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the point at which a connection can be made in an electric circuit
